landingPage.heroDescription: Aibond is an AI partner for <highlight>international couples</highlight> that analyzes your conversations and deepens your bond
landingPage.heroDescription2: With conversation analysis AI, automatically generate real-time translations, promise lists, and manuals to support your relationship!
landingPage.heroSampleText: "Since you're good at cooking, how about you cook and I do the dishes?"
landingPage.heroSampleResult: ‚Üí Bond Notes: Set household chore assignments
landingPage.featuresDescription: More than just a recording tool.
landingPage.featuresDescription2: Aibond is a tool to deepen your understanding and build a better relationship.
landingPage.feature1Description: AI automatically summarizes your discussions. Eliminate 'he said, she said' disputes. Promises and tasks are automatically added to Bond Notes with reminders.
landingPage.feature2Description: AI analyzes your partner's personality and preferences from daily conversations. Automatically creates and updates a personalized 'user manual' to deepen your understanding.
landingPage.feature3Description: Having lots of arguments lately? Consult with AI. Get objective advice to improve your relationship based on conversation history and manuals.
landingPage.feature4Description: Perfect for couples with language barriers. High-accuracy real-time translation supports your conversations. Same-language couples can use it as a transcription tool.
landingPage.useCasesDescription: Aibond solves communication challenges for all couples
landingPage.useCase1Description: Small memory differences lead to arguments. You want to objectively review past conversations.
landingPage.useCase2Description: You forget casual promises like "let's go there someday" or chores you were asked to do, disappointing your partner.
landingPage.useCase3Description: You don't know why they're upset or how to approach them. You want to understand your partner more deeply.
landingPage.useCase4Description: You keep arguing about the same topics. Can't have constructive discussions and find solutions.
landingPage.useCase5Description: As an international couple, subtle nuances get lost. You want to have deeper conversations in your native languages.
landingPage.useCase6Description: You want to keep records of daily conversations and important discussions as memories of your relationship.
landingPage.useCasesCta: Build your ideal partnership with Aibond
landingPage.pricingDescription: Choose the plan that fits your needs
landingPage.faqDescription: Answers to common questions about Aibond
landingPage.faq1Answer: Absolutely! Aibond offers more than just translation - conversation recording, AI summaries, and manual creation to deepen your relationship. Many same-language couples use it too.
landingPage.faq2Answer: AI automatically analyzes your partner's personality, likes, dislikes, and values from conversation data. The more you talk, the more detailed and accurate your manual becomes.
landingPage.faq3Answer: Conversation data is securely transmitted via HTTPS and stored in cloud databases. AI analysis is automatic and never seen by human eyes.
landingPage.faq4Question: Can I use just one language?
landingPage.faq4Answer: Yes. Real-time translation only activates when you and your partner have different main languages set.
landingPage.faq5Question: What can I do with the free plan?
landingPage.faq5Answer: The free plan includes up to 2 hours of recording per month, AI summaries, and basic manual creation. Try it free first, then upgrade as needed.
landingPage.faq6Question: Can I use it during arguments?
landingPage.faq6Answer: Yes! In fact, Aibond is most helpful during arguments. AI objectively records and summarizes emotional discussions, supporting calmer resolutions. AI consultation is also recommended.

settings.legalDescription: Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, and Legal Notices

terms.article1Content: These Terms set forth the terms and conditions for the provision of Aibond (hereinafter "the Service") and the rights and obligations between users (hereinafter "Users") and us. By using the Service, you are deemed to have agreed to these Terms.
terms.article2Item1: The Service is intended for users aged 18 and older (self-declaration). Users under 18 are not permitted to use the Service.
terms.article2Item2: Users shall create an account with accurate information and manage it appropriately.
terms.article2Item3: Partner linking is conducted between two parties, and even if dissolved, data will be handled in accordance with Article 7.
terms.article3Item1: Details of free and paid plans will be provided separately.
terms.article3Item2: Paid plans are automatically renewed upon expiration. Billing will continue unless cancellation procedures are completed.
terms.article3Item3: In principle, no refunds will be provided. However, if the Service becomes unavailable due to significant service failures attributable to us, we will respond individually.
terms.article4Item1: Acts that violate laws or public order and morals
terms.article4Item2: Infringement of third-party rights, registration of false information
terms.article4Item3: Acts that interfere with the operation of the Service, excessive access load
terms.article5Item1: The Service is provided "as is" and does not guarantee uninterrupted or defect-free operation.
terms.article5Item2: We may add, modify, or discontinue features without prior notice.
terms.article6Content: Copyrights, trademarks, and other intellectual property rights related to the Service belong to us or legitimate rights holders.
terms.article7Title: Article 7 (Handling and Storage of User Data)
terms.article7Item1: Audio data, transcriptions, translations, summaries, chat history, etc. (collectively "User Data") will be stored and used for providing and improving the Service, developing new features, and statistical analysis.
terms.article7Item2: Even if partner linking is dissolved, User Data will be retained by us as a private archive (not viewable by users, internal storage only).
terms.article7Item3: Upon account deletion, personally identifiable information (name, email address, speaker names) will be deleted. Conversation data (including audio) may be retained for service improvement and AI learning after anonymization processing (speaker name removal, audio pitch conversion, etc.).
terms.article7Item4: If you wish to completely delete all data including anonymized data, please contact support@aibond.com. We will respond except where we are required to retain data by law.
terms.article7Item5: We will not sell or transfer User Data to third parties. In the event of business transfer, company split, etc., assets including User Data may be transferred to the successor. In such cases, the successor will handle data under these Terms or equivalent standards.
terms.article7Item6: The Service may transmit User Data to external services (e.g., Google Gemini, Google Cloud Speech-to-Text/Translation) for AI processing. Recipients are specified in the Privacy Policy.
terms.article8Item1: We shall not be liable for damages arising from use unless caused by our intentional misconduct or gross negligence.
terms.article8Item2: For damages caused by failures of third-party services (payment, AI, cloud, etc.), responsibility is subject to the scope of liability of such services.
terms.article9Item1: We may terminate the Service with reasonable advance notice.
terms.article9Item2: The Service may be transferred to third parties through business transfer, company split, merger, etc. Upon transfer, we will notify users by reasonable means, and require the successor to handle User Data under these Terms or equivalent standards.
terms.article10Content: These Terms shall be governed by Japanese law, and the Tokyo District Court shall have exclusive jurisdiction of first instance for any disputes.
terms.supplementItem1: These Terms shall come into effect from December 1, 2025.
terms.supplementItem2: If these Terms are revised, we will notify you in advance by posting on this page and by email to your registered email address or in-app notification.

privacy.section1Content1: Aibond (hereinafter "the Service") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information. This Policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and your rights.
privacy.section1Content2: The Service is intended for users aged 18 and older (self-declaration). We do not intentionally collect personal information from users under 18.
privacy.section2_1Item3: Authentication information (password hash, OAuth connection info)
privacy.section2_3Item1: Service usage status (usage amount, access logs)
privacy.section2_4Content: Payment processing for paid plans is delegated to Stripe, Inc., and we do not directly store payment information such as credit card numbers.
privacy.section3Intro: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
privacy.section3Item1: Providing and operating the Service (transcription, translation, AI chat, etc.)
privacy.section3Item4: Improving AI/machine learning models (using anonymized data)
privacy.section3Item5: Statistical analysis (in a non-personally identifiable format)
privacy.section3Item6: Preventing unauthorized use and security measures
privacy.section4Intro: We do not sell or transfer your personal information to third parties. However, to provide the Service, we transmit data to the following external services:
privacy.section4Item1: Google Cloud Speech-to-Text: Audio transcription processing
privacy.section4Item2: Google Cloud Translation: Text translation processing
privacy.section4Item3: Google Gemini: AI chat and summary generation
privacy.section4Item5: Supabase: Database, authentication, and file storage
privacy.section4_1Content: In the event of business transfer, company split, merger, etc., User Data (including anonymized data) may be transferred to the successor. The successor will handle data at or above the level of this Policy.
privacy.section5_1Content: All User Data is stored in a state accessible to you.
privacy.section5_2Content: Even if partner linking is dissolved, User Data will be retained by us as a private archive (not viewable by you).
privacy.section5_3Content: Upon account deletion, personally identifiable information (name, email address, speaker names) will be deleted. Conversation data (including audio) may be retained for service improvement and AI learning after anonymization processing (speaker name removal, audio pitch conversion, etc.). Personal identification becomes difficult from processed data.
privacy.section6Item1: Right of Access: The right to access and confirm your data
privacy.section6Item2: Right to Rectification: The right to request correction of inaccurate data
privacy.section6Item3: Right to Erasure: The right to request deletion of data
privacy.section6Item4: Right to Object: The right to object to data processing
privacy.section6CompleteContent: If you wish to completely delete all data including anonymized data, please contact support@aibond.com. We will respond except where we are required to retain data by law.
privacy.section7Intro: We take the following measures to protect your data:
privacy.section8Intro: The Service uses cookies and similar technologies for the following purposes:
privacy.section8Content: You can disable cookies through your browser settings, but some features may be limited.
privacy.section9Content: If this Policy is revised, we will notify you in advance by posting on this page and by email to your registered email address or in-app notification.
privacy.section10Content: For privacy inquiries, disclosure requests, corrections, or deletions of data, please contact support@aibond.com.
